use.flag: Enable support for running x86_64 applications on arm64 via binary translation
Use sys-devel/crossdev for the toolchain rather than dev-util/mingw64-toolchain (requires manual setting up and is mostly unsupported, try disabling if have issues)
Build PE files using dev-util/mingw64-toolchain (more tested) rather than llvm-core/clang (newer)

Enable the "new" wow64 mode that allows running 32bit applications without 32bit ELF multilib by mapping to 64bit calls. Generally works well with wine-11.0 or newer, but may or may not have a small perforamce impact or other issues. If USE=mingw is set, still need the default abi_x86_32 set on dev-util/mingw64-toolchain but that can be done even with /no-multilib/ profiles.
This can also be enabled on arm64 to allow running x86 applications via binary translation.
